label: A2B_oC24_20_abc_c-001
title: Orthorhombic (High) Tridymite (SiO$_{2}$) Structure
comments: (Dollase, 1967) used a non-standard origin for the atomic positions, so there has been a considerable rearrangement of the coordinates, even from the previous version of this file.  We have chosen the ordering of the axes so that it is obvious that the primitive base-centered orthorhombic lattice is very close to a tetragonal primitive lattice.
